Graduate Research Assistant at Miami University specializing in Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning, and Reinforcement Learning. Experienced in developing distributed systems, federated learning models, and quantum-inspired computing frameworks. Passionate about applying AI to real-world problems such as food delivery optimization, path planning, and computational biology.
